name: Iron Punch
description:
Mighty hero with overwhelming powers
Special abilities to master and upgrade
Unique design and colorful animations
Tons of different enemies
You are a true battle machine. Your combat style evolved from professional boxing and got improved with modern mechanics.
Welcome to the city of ordinary mortals where no one can stand against your super punches.
Fight your way through the hordes of gangsters and mafia members.
Stand against corrupted cops and military forces.
Use your brute strength and be the number one.
